body.ab: <milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0011__main__16"/><del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e279"/>When I<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e279"/><del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e283"/>I had<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e283"/> My brothers were consi<lb n="c56-0011__main__17"/>derably younger than myself but I had had <lb n="c56-0011__main__18"/> a friend <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e294"/>who<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e294"/><del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e298"/>who<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e298"/> in one of my school <lb n="c56-0011__main__19"/> fellows who compensated for this. deficiency. Henry<lb n="c56-0011__main__20"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e310"/>Carignan<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e310"/>Clerval was theson<del rend="strikethrough" of my father<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e331"/>'s<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e331"/> – he was a boy of singu<lb n="c56-0011__main__23"/>lar talent&<del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e341"/>fancy<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e341"/> fancy I remember <lb n="c56-0011__main__24"/> when he was only nine years old he <lb n="c56-0011__main__25"/> wrote a fairy tale which was the <lb n="c56-0011__main__26"/> delight and amazement of all his <lb n="c56-0011__main__27"/> companions. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e353"/>Like Don Quixote<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e353"/> his <lb n="c56-0011__main__28"/> favourite study <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e360"/>was<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e360"/>consisted in books ofchi<lb n="c56-0011__main__29"/>valry& romance and <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>when very young, I canremember that we used to <lb n="c56-0011__main__30"/> act plays composed by him out of <lb n="c56-0011__main__31"/> th<mdel>is</mdel>ese<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e399"/>favourite<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e399"/> books, the principal <lb n="c56-0011__main__32"/><del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0011__main__d2e405"/>car<del eID="c56-0011__main__d2e405"/>characters of which were Orlando <lb n="c56-0011__main__33"/> Robin Hood, Amadis and St. George– <lb n="c56-0011__main__34"/> No youth could could be more happy<lb n="c56-0012__main__1"/> than mine. – <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0012__main__d2e424"/>Our<del eID="c56-0012__main__d2e424"/>My parents were indul<lb n="c56-0012__main__2"/>gent, and my companions amiable. <lb n="c56-0012__main__3"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0012__main__d2e440"/>and our stud<del eID="c56-0012__main__d2e440"/> Our studies were never <lb n="c56-0012__main__4"/> forced, and by some means we al<lb n="c56-0012__main__5"/>ways had an end placed in view which <lb n="c56-0012__main__6"/> excited us to ardour.<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>in the prosecution of them. It was by this <mdel>&</mdel>method<lb n="c56-0012__main__7"/> not by emulation that we were <lb n="c56-0012__main__8"/> urged. Elizabeth was not told to apply <lb n="c56-0012__main__9"/> herself to drawing <mdel>or</mdel>that her companions <lb n="c56-0012__main__10"/><del rend="strikethrough" <mdel>to</mdel>that we might read the writ<del sID="c56-0012__main__d2e581" type="overwritten"/>ers<del eID="c56-0012__main__d2e581"/>ings<mdel>of</mdel>in those <lb n="c56-0012__main__16"/> languages many books <lb n="c56-0012__main__22"/> or learn <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0012__main__d2e639"/>a<del eID="c56-0012__main__d2e639"/> languages so quickly <lb n="c56-0012__main__23"/> as <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0012__main__d2e646"/>another child<del eID="c56-0012__main__d2e646"/>those who are disciplined according to the ordinarymethod, but what we <lb n="c56-0012__main__24"/> learned was impressed the more deeply on our <lb n="c56-0012__main__25"/> memory.
